entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 a.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.6Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow in the morning. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
